alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 02 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Arthur and south central Grant Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 518 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles northwest of Lemoyne, or 13 miles southwest of Arthur, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arthur, Haythorn Lake, Jensen Lake, Green Lake, Sand Puddin Lake, Velma, Cogill Lake and McKeag. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 115 and 148. Highway 92 between mile markers 165 and 167. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
